All functions

binned_residuals()

Binned residuals for logistic regression

check_collinearity()

Check for multicollinearity of model predictors

Convergence test for mixed effects models

Classify the distribution of a model-family using machine learning

Check overdispersion of GL(M)M's

check_singularity()

Check mixed models for boundary fits

check_zeroinflation()

Check for zero-inflation in count models

classify_distribution

Machine learning model trained to classify distributions

Mean Inter-Item-Correlation

item_reliability()

item_split_half()

looic()

LOO-related Indices for Bayesian regressions.
